answers.answer: Clonidine helped a lot for me... Takes away a lot of the hot cold sweats and helps you relax... Also helped me sleep a little ... Which when you go through this is a god send ... It's a bp med tho so only take what dr prescribed and try not to take it past 7 days

I am 5'6 and 180 lbs.  I currently take metformin 500 mg 2x a day for diabetes.  My blood sugar is under control.  Please respond if you can advise me on the use of clonide and if there is also another med to use in addition to the withdrawal.
title: Does Clonidine really help with withdrawals
